trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Selma
There were no other sightings in Selma on or around September 7th 2002
Summary: observed flashing red and green and white lights.
divs: Sighting DetailsI walked outside and to myleft notice abright light futtering around.It thenstreaked down at a high rate of speed,then stop on a dime and begin flutteringaround,shortly it disappeared below the hill. It appeared to be many milesaway.I called Carol to come out to see it when she spotted a second one due westof us.We watched it for ahour or so until it too fell below the trees. Both ofthese objects moved very quickly both up and down as well as from side toside.When we frist saw the object, we thought it was a helicoptor,but I was atone time a pilot and it flew way too fast and no noise.
